original_title: 担任の先生と私の秘密のラブラブ結婚生活　永瀬ゆい
overview: I'm Yui, a school girl. Actually, I ... I have a husband. The other person is a homeroom teacher. Of course, it's a secret ... I'm wondering if it would be interesting to get caught! Please experience the daily life of Yui's newlyweds!
title: Me And My Homeroom Teacher's Secret Lovey-dovey Married Life - Yui Nagai
